member.name: T:AI_Assgmt.BestFirst
member.summary: Best First Search class. Uses PriorityQueue as open list, and Dictionary as close list.

member.name: F:AI_Assgmt.BaseSolver.initstate
member.summary: The initial state of the 8 puzzle.

member.name: F:AI_Assgmt.BaseSolver.watch
member.summary: Used to capture the time taken for the Solve method to find the goal state.

member.name: T:AI_Assgmt.BaseSolver
member.summary: Base class.

member.name: T:AI_Assgmt.DepthFirst
member.summary: Depth First Search class. Uses Stack as open list, and Dictionary as close list.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.PriorityQueue.IsRepetitionExist(System.Int32,AI_Assgmt.State)
member.summary: Overrides the method from BasePriority class. It checks whether the same state exist in the queue. If yes, it compares the state's level found from the queue with the specified state's level. If the state from the queue is deeper, it will be replaced with the specified state.
member.returns: True if there is repetition of the state, False otherwise.

member.name: T:AI_Assgmt.PriorityQueue
member.summary: PriorityQueue class.

member.name: F:AI_Assgmt.BasePriorityQueue`1.items
member.summary: A list of QueueItem.

member.name: F:AI_Assgmt.BasePriorityQueue`1.m_allowrepeat
member.summary: A flag to determine whether the queue allows repetition of the same item.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.BasePriorityQueue`1.Enqueue(System.Int32,`0)
member.summary: Adds an object to the queue, and place the object in the queue based on the key. Object with key will be at the left end in the queue.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.BasePriorityQueue`1.Dequeue
member.summary: Removes the left most object from the queue.
member.returns: The left most object in the queue.

member.name: P:AI_Assgmt.BasePriorityQueue`1.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of objects actually contained in the queue.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.BasePriorityQueue`1.IsRepetitionExist(System.Int32,`0)
member.summary: Checks whether there is repetition of the key in the queue.
member.returns: True if there is repetition of the key, False otherwise.

member.name: P:AI_Assgmt.BasePriorityQueue`1.AllowRepeat
member.summary: Gets/Sets the allow repeat mode of the queue.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.BasePriorityQueue`1.Replace(System.Collections.Generic.LinkedListNode{AI_Assgmt.QueueItem{`0}},AI_Assgmt.QueueItem{`0})
member.summary: Replaces an existing object in the queue with a new object.

member.name: P:AI_Assgmt.BasePriorityQueue`1.List
member.summary: Gets the actual queue.

member.name: T:AI_Assgmt.BasePriorityQueue`1
member.summary: Base class of priority queue, where an element in the queue is QueueItem object.

member.name: T:AI_Assgmt.QueueItem`1
member.summary: Generic class of queue item, consist of key (int) and a generic object (T). Used in BasePriorityQueue class.

member.name: P:AI_Assgmt.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:AI_Assgmt.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:AI_Assgmt.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: F:AI_Assgmt.State.m_state
member.summary: The state value, represented in reversed order from the 9 slots in the 8 puzzle.

member.name: F:AI_Assgmt.State.m_heuristicval
member.summary: The heuristic value of this state.

member.name: F:AI_Assgmt.State.m_level
member.summary: The depth level of this state. The initial state will have level 0.

member.name: F:AI_Assgmt.State.m_evalue
member.summary: The evaluation value of this state. EValue = depth level + heuristic value

member.name: F:AI_Assgmt.State.m_parent
member.summary: A reference of the parent state.

member.name: P:AI_Assgmt.State.StateValue
member.summary: Gets the state value.

member.name: P:AI_Assgmt.State.HeuristicValue
member.summary: Gets/Sets the heuristic value.

member.name: P:AI_Assgmt.State.Level
member.summary: Gets the depth level.

member.name: P:AI_Assgmt.State.EValue
member.summary: Gets the evaluation value.

member.name: P:AI_Assgmt.State.Parent
member.summary: Gets/Sets the reference of the parent state.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.State.Equals(AI_Assgmt.State)
member.summary: Indicates whether the current object is equal to another object of the same type.
member.returns: True if the state of this object is equal to another object's state, False otherwise.

member.name: T:AI_Assgmt.State
member.summary: A class which encapsulates a state in the 8 puzzle.

member.name: F:AI_Assgmt.Utils.initstate
member.summary: The initial state of the puzzle. It will be overwritten by the init_state specified in the config.xml file.

member.name: F:AI_Assgmt.Utils.goalstate
member.summary: The goal state of the puzzle that the program will try to find. It will be overwritten by the goal_state specified in the config.xml file.

member.name: F:AI_Assgmt.Utils.depthlimit
member.summary: The depth limit that will be used in Depth First Search to search up to a certain level. It will be overwritten by the depth_limit specified in the config.xml file

member.name: F:AI_Assgmt.Utils.goalstatemap
member.summary: The goal state map array. It maps each digit in the goal state to row and column. Used for heuristic value calculation.

member.name: F:AI_Assgmt.Utils.BreadthFirstFile
member.summary: The file name for Breadth First Search output. The output is the path of the initial state to goal state (in reverse, goal state first).

member.name: F:AI_Assgmt.Utils.DepthFirstFile
member.summary: The file name for Depth First Search output. The output is the path of the initial state to goal state (in reverse, goal state first).

member.name: F:AI_Assgmt.Utils.BestFirstFile
member.summary: The file name for Best First Search output. The output is the path of the initial state to goal state (in reverse, goal state first).

member.name: F:AI_Assgmt.Utils.GoalStateNotFound
member.summary: The message to be displayed if the goal state not found.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.Utils.IsGoalState(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks whether the given state is the goal state.
member.returns: True if the state is goal state, False otherwise.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.Utils.GetBlankIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the index of digit 0 from a given state.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.Utils.GetIndexOfDigit(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the index of a specified digit from a given state.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.Utils.GetDigitAtIndex(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a digit from a specified index from a given state.
member.returns: The digit from a specified index.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.Utils.SetDigitAtIndex(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets a digit at the specified index.
member.returns: A new state with the digit sets at the specified index.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.Utils.SwapDigit(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Swaps 2 digits and returns a new state.
member.returns: A new state with 2 digits being exchanged.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.Utils.MoveBlank(System.Int32,System.Int32,AI_Assgmt.Utils.Direction)
member.summary: Moves the blank with the specified direction.
member.returns: A new state with a new blank position.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.Utils.ResolveNextStates(System.Int32)
member.summary: Resolves the possible next states from a given state which determines by the current blank index.
member.returns: An array of possible next states.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.Utils.GetHeuristicValue(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the heuristic value from a given state. It calculates the row offset and column offset from the goal state. The distance is row offset + column offset.
member.returns: The heuristic value from a given state.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.Utils.GetStateString(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Gets a string representation from a given state. e.g A state with 250816743 will be represented in
347 618 52
member.returns: The string representation from a given state.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.Utils.ShowPuzzle
member.summary: Displays the 8 puzzle in the console.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.Utils.ShowNoSolutionMessage
member.summary: Displays the solution not found message.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.Utils.SetPuzzle
member.summary: Initializes the 8 puzzle with initial state, goal state, and depth limit from config.xml file.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.Utils.SetGoalStateMap
member.summary: Initializes the goalstatemap array. It keeps the row and column for each digit in the goal state.

member.name: M:AI_Assgmt.Utils.ReverseString(System.String)
member.summary: Reverses a string.
member.returns: A new string with the original string being reversed.

member.name: T:AI_Assgmt.Utils
member.summary: Helper class which provides all the necessary static methods used in the entire application.

member.name: T:AI_Assgmt.BreadthFirst
member.summary: Breadth First Search class. Uses Queue as open list, and Dictionary as close list.
